Posts.Content: mom2Bnegativex3 wrote: I start Taxol and Carboplatin combo soon and will be having it every three weeks! only 3 treatments. I have already had AC DD AND Taxol 4 years ago so I would like to be prepared! Can anyone give me any insight on what to expect? I will be meeting my chemo NURSE on Friday but coming from some one who has been through it would be great!! Hope everyone is doing great today:) Thank you!!
